moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Memory Shellcode Injection Module
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module will inject into the memory of a process a specified shellcode.
author: phra <https://iwantmore.pizza>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SHELLCODE
options.description: Path to the shellcode to execute

options.name: PID
options.description: Process Identifier of process to inject the shellcode. (0 = new process)

options.name: PPID
options.description: Process Identifier for PPID spoofing when creating a new process. (0 = no PPID spoofing)

options.name: WAIT_UNHOOK
options.description: Seconds to wait for unhook to be executed
